svg.text: politics
The payola business is a political crime. The legislative
violations of the Hatch Act which recompense elections.
For example, The Trump Tax Cuts.
Political extortion assures the obscurity of the political
crime of the political prostitution of "exploitation
government".
The intrigues of population manipulation and government
megalomania the morass of medievalism. The wasting of
self and other to the selfishness, defeatism, and
annhilation of narcissism, avarice, and sadism.
A perpetual scenography of political larceny and felony.
The payola and its varieties of normalization and
obfuscation. For example, The Trump National Debt.
In the historical review, Reaganomics: A Historical
Watershed (2018), the history of "trickle down economics"
is documented in the diverse contexts of theory and policy
that constitute the complexity of the national experience.
References
Komlos, John, Reaganomics: A Historical Watershed
(2018). CESifo Working Paper No. 7301,
https://ssrn.com/abstract=3338628
